description: Asp.Net Core Tag Helpers to use when localizing Asp.Net Core applications instead of manually injecting IViewLocator. Usage To use these tag helpers add the following to your `_ViewImports.cshtml` file @addTagHelper *, Localization.AspNetCore.TagHelpers The package currently supports three tag helpers with the following usage cases: Usage with the tag name `Text to localize` Usage with a html attribute `Text to localize` Ability to localize html attribute using the following: `This won't`
